name: Color Junction Free
description:
Color Junction is a very popular puzzle game. Original version of this game was developed by Kiniaki Moribe in 1995. Then Mihai P developed another version for Google customized home page.

The goal of the game is very simple: clear the board. To remove cells tap on at least two connected ones of the same color.

Free Version Features:
1, Intelligence Tips. It can give you tips almost the whole gameplay just by tap the “Tip” button.
2, Undo or redo for one step. Shake your iphone/ipod to undo or redo.
3, 1 difficulty with 5 puzzles.

Full Version Features:
1, Auto-save game data and recover.
2, 3 difficulties and 20 puzzles for each difficulty.
3, High scores.


Contact us: jerryjee120@gmail.com
